metadata.summary: Low-level artifact collection extension for automated forensic data gathering via D&R rules, sensor collections, or REST API
metadata.primary_use_case: Automate collection of forensic artifacts like event logs, file captures, and network traffic from endpoints

extracted_apis.description: Collect and upload artifacts from a sensor
